title: Decline Of Western Civilization Part 2
description:
ABOUT:
This is Penelope Spheeris' second and perhaps most popular
musical documentary release in the series. Both Decline I 
and II are yet to be mastered to a digital format (according 
to http://www.declinemovies.com/ ) but please realise that 
these films are worth purchasing as soon as you don't have 
to pay US$200 for a fucked, 2nd hand, 30 year old VHS copy 
of them which has signal bleeding from one layer on the
VHS spindle to the next layer down on the spindle throughout 
the film. You likey filmy? Please buy it when it is released.


SOURCE:
DVD-Rip from the "Right Beyond" branded Thai DVD release of 
The Decline of Western Civilization - Part II. This was a 
very small volume pressed run from 2003 and I believe was 
the only instance where this film made it to release on DVD 
with the only other versions available being either VHS or 
in cinemas. 

ENCODE:
DivX 5.x/6.x
Video - 704x528 25fps progressive. 
Audio - 48000Hz 448kbps CBR AC3. G-Spot says 6 channel audio
but i'm sure its just 2 channels.



AGAIN, I WONT BE ABLE TO SEED THIS FOR TOO LONG OR AT HIGH SPEED SO PLEASE SEED TO OR PAST A RATIO OF 1.0
